attributes.review: This app took a solid 3 weeks (or more) to download, but I wish I had never installed it at all. As soon as I opened the app, I began to receive text messages from strange numbers, telling me to vote Trump 2020 or they'd take away my right to vote. I later searched the area codes and found out these numbers were from Russia. Not only that, but this app contains very graphic images of animal cruelty and obscene p*rnography. Not very child friendly. Not only that, but all of the data on my phone was wiped and replaced with images of the MAGA logo and the president's most meaningful quotes, such as "Grab her by the p*ssy." Long story short, I don't find this app to be helpful in any way shape or form, and demand it be removed from the app store immediately!
attributes.title: DANGER!
